description: Common definitions used in validating user input to and returning data from the 'product' REST endpoint.

source.description: The source of a record.  If the record is provided by a source database, this field will be set to a unique string identifying the source.  If this record is unique to the Unified Listing, this field will be set to 'ul'.

errors.type: You must provide a source name for this product.
errors.minLength: You must provide a source name for this product.
errors.maxLength: You must provide a source name for this product.

sid.description: The unique identifier to identify this record in the source database.

errors.type: You must provide a source ID for this product.
errors.minLength: You must provide a source ID for this product.
errors.maxLength: You must provide a source ID for this product.

uid.description: The Universal ID ('uid') is an id that is unique in the Unified listing and which is constant for different editions of a product.  'Source' records use this field to indicate which 'unified' record they are associated with (if any).

errors.type: You must provide the ID of the Unified Listing for this product.
errors.minLength: You must provide the ID of the Unified Listing for this product.
errors.maxLength: You must provide the ID of the Unified Listing for this product.

errors.type: You must provide the name of the product.
errors.minLength: You must provide the name of the product.

errors.type: The product description must be a string.
errors.minLength: The product description must be one or more characters long.

manufacturer.description: A JSON object describing the manufacturer.

errors.type: The product manufacturer's name must be a string.
errors.minLength: The product manufacturer's name must be one or more characters long.

address.description: The street address of the manufacturer (may also be used for the complete address).

errors.type: The manufacturer's address must be a string.
errors.minLength: The manufacturer's address must be one or more characters long.

postalCode.description: The postal code (ZIP code, etc.) of the manufacturer.

errors.type: The manufacturer's postal code must be a string.
errors.minLength: The manufacturer's postal code must be one or more characters long.

cityTown.description: The city/town in which the manufacturer is located.

errors.type: The manufacturer's city/town must be a string.
errors.minLength: The manufacturer's city/town must be one or more characters long.

provinceRegion.description: The province/region in which the manufacturer is located.

errors.type: The manufacturer's province/region must be a string.
errors.minLength: The manufacturer's province/region must be one or more characters long.

country.description: The country in which the manufacturer is located.

errors.type: The manufacturer's country must be a string.
errors.minLength: The manufacturer's country must be one or more characters long.

phone.description: The phone number of the manufacturer.

errors.type: The manufacturer's phone number must be a string.
errors.minLength: The manufacturer's phone number must be one or more characters long.

email.description: An email address at which the manufacturer can be contacted.

errors.type: The manufacturer's email address must be a string.
errors.form: The manufacturer's email address must be valid.

errors.type: The manufacturer's URL  must be a string.
errors.minLength: The manufacturer's URL must be a valid URL.

errors.required/0: You must provide the name of the product's manufacturer.

status.description: The status of this record. Current supported values are: 'new', 'active', 'discontinued', 'deleted'.

errors.enum: You must provide a valid status.  Currently supported values are: 'new', 'active', 'discontinued', and 'deleted'.

language.description: The language used in the text of this record, expressed using a two letter language, code, an underscore, and a two letter country code, as in `en_us` or `it_it`.  If this is not specified, `en_us` is assumed.

errors.pattern: You must provide a valid language code (ex: en_us).
errors.type: You must provide a valid language code (ex: en_us).

sourceData.description: The original source record represented as a JSON object.

sources.description: A list of records that are associated with this one.  Only used by 'unified' records.

updated.description: The date at which the record was last updated.

errors.format: You must provide a valid date.
errors.type: You must provide a valid date.
